Next Gen Guide

Advancing personal growth of the Next Generation


Meet Our Mentors

Mission and Vision

NextGen advances person growth for the next generation. We do that by connecting students seeking advise with mentors. Our vision is to establish an environment with free and easy access to real information and guidance for next chapter.

NextGen’s mission and vision is based on our core values:

Next Gen cares

We care for what’s next, as the future lies in the next generation.

Next Gen connects

We connect by creating a global network between alumni in professional setting and up-and-coming talent.

Next Gen shares

We share our personal experience and knowledge from diverse fields of interest.

Next Gen inspires

We inspire by personally investing in young people just like us from few years ago.

© NextGen, 2019
